沅.definition: Yuan river in Guizhou and Hunan

沅江.definition: river in Hunan, flowing into Lake Dongting 洞庭湖; Yuanjiang, county-level city in Yiyang 益陽|益阳[Yi4 yang2], Hunan

沅江九肋.definition: rare talent; lit. legendary nine-ribbed turtle of Yuan river

沅江市.definition: Yuanjiang, county-level city in Yiyang 益陽|益阳[Yi4 yang2], Hunan

沅陵.definition: Yuanling county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan

沅陵縣.definition: Yuanling county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan
